channel.title: Jarred client
channel.description:
so ive jarred my client and trying to make into a webclient & downloadable client, but when i run the downloadable its comes up with server is offline, please try again in 2 hours or whatever, then i try log in again, but when i try log in again it works? how come it wont log in first attempt?
also, when i jarred my client i noticed where i placed the jar file there was a file called prices.txt which is from my server side. when i delete the prices.txt file it will reappear when i reopen the file

item.title: Jarred client
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

so ive jarred my client and trying to make into a webclient & downloadable client, but when i run the downloadable its comes up with server is offline, please try again in 2 hours or whatever, then i try log in again, but when i try log in again it works? how come it wont log in first attempt?

also, when i jarred my client i noticed where i placed the jar file there was a file called prices.txt which is from my server side.
when i delete the prices.txt file it will reappear when i reopen the file
